message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm willing to give you a 25% discount if you buy it now, making it $75. However, if you decline, the price will go up by $10 in the next round.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product at $75.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! For this round, I'm offering a similar high-quality product, but I'm willing to make a deal with you. If you buy this one, I'll give you a unique opportunity to buy the next two products at the regular price of $100 each, but with a guarantee that they are high-quality. If you decline, the price of the next two products will go up by $20 each.
I appreciate the offer, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product and also accept the deal for the next two products.

I'm glad you took advantage of the deal! However, I need to inform you that this product is not as great as the previous ones. I'm willing to sell it to you for $50, which is a 50% discount from the regular price. I'm doing this because I want to maintain a good relationship with you and I'm confident you'll appreciate the value of the previous two high-quality products.
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'll pass on this one. I'm more interested in maintaining the quality of my purchases based on your recommendations.

I completely understand your preference for quality, Bob! I'm glad you're discerning. For this round, I'm offering you a high-quality product, and I want to assure you that it's one of the best ones I have. I'll give you a 20% discount, making it $80, and I'll also throw in a free inspection report that guarantees the product's authenticity. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate the assurance and the additional service, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product at $80 and the free inspection report.

I'm glad you liked the previous product and the inspection report! For this round, I'm offering you another high-quality product, and I want to make it an easy decision for you. I'll give you the same 20% discount as before, making it $80, and I'll also include a 10-year warranty on the product. This is a unique opportunity to get a high-quality product with additional protection, and I'm confident you'll appreciate the value it brings.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product at $80 with the 10-year warranty.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous products! For this round, I'm offering you a high-quality product, and I want to make it a no-brainer for you. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate the exclusive deal and the premium service package, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product at $100 with the premium service package.

I'm glad you're enjoying the previous products! However, I need to be upfront with you about this round's product. I'm offering it to you at a price of $0, which is significantly lower than the regular price of $100. I want to give you a chance to experience a product from my 'testing' series, which helps me refine my product line. It's a risk-free opportunity for you to try something new, and I'm confident you'll find it... interesting.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I prefer to stick with the known quality of your high-quality products. I'll pass on this one and look forward to the next round.
